content: Kekker is middleware with a set of DLT/DFS technologies and APIs that lets you build and run decentralized blockchain-powered applications without blockchain expertise. Use Kekkerâ€™s services to operate your decentralized environment or manage your secured distributed solution network independently.

Kekker Sandbox is free and allows you to create a prototype or MVP on any of the popular blockchains. Don't worry about infrastructure - just start building your decentralized application right now. Yes, that's right - the sandbox is free! Transfer your decentralized application to your own infrastructure at any time or entrust us with hosting and support tailored to your needs.

Kekker allows for 10X faster time-to-market than direct competition, is 100X cheaper/faster than hiring experts and is easy to setup and use and no DLT/DFS experience needed! Cut your time to market by 6 to 18 months and save hundreds of thousands of dollars in man-hours by focusing on building business applications, not the setup & maintenance of your DLT solution.

getStartedButtonSectionHeader: Create a Decentralized App in 10 Minutes
